mapper.sql: d_id, d_coumity_name, d_coding, d_name, d_sum, d_txt, create_time, d_status, is_del
mapper.insert: insert into doshu (d_coumity_name, d_name, d_sum, d_txt) values (#{doShu.dCoumityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doShu.dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doShu.dSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{doShu.dTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update group8cmsystem.doshu set doshu.d_status=1, doshu.d_coumity_name=#{doShu.dCoumityName}, doshu.d_name=#{doShu.dName}, doshu.d_sum=#{doShu.DSum}, doshu.d_txt=#{doShu.dTxt} where doshu.d_id=#{doShu.DId}
mapper.select:
select * from group8cmsystem.doshu
AND(doshu.d_name like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%'))
AND doshu.create_time between concat(#{creatTime},'00:00:00') and concat(#{creatTime},'23:59:59')
